alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 2:57PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN ONEIDA AND NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTIES... At 251 PM EST, a persistent band of heavy lake effect snow had finally shifted to the north, with the heaviest snowfall generally north of Florence and into extreme northern Oneida County, including Boonville. The lull is expected to last for a couple hours, with the band expected to plunge southward this evening ahead of an incoming upper level disturbance. Gusty winds will continue to cause blowing and drifting of snow in the meantime. When the snow band returns, expect heavy snowfall rates with visibility near zero at times. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
